lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Aihinis mid rhq BwNjn ibKY; jwnq n mrmu ikDau kvn pRkwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as wine remains in a bottle day and night but that bottle/ pot does not know its characteristics.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ idn rwq brqn igln surwhI boql Awid ivc midrw peI rihMdI hY, pr brqn nUM ies g`l dI koeI sUJ nhIˆ hoieAw krdI ik ieh kIh kuC hY qy iks Bwˆq dI vsqU[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bylI Bir Bir bwNit dIjIAq sBw; pwvq n Bydu kCu ibiD n bIcwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as in a party, wine is distributed in cups, but that cup does not know its (wine) secret nor thinks about it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Pyr pÎwlI Br Br ky mjls AMdr vrqw dyeIdI hY, qy auh pÎwlI BI kuC mrm nhIˆ pw skdI kÎoˆik Es ny BI koeI ibiD ies dy c`j Awid pRBwv dw vIcwr nhIˆ kIqw huMdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy idnpRiq mdu bycq klwl bYTy; mihmw n jwneI drb ihqkwrI hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a wine merchant sells wine all the time during the day but his greed of wealth does not know the significance of its intoxication.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ swrw idn roz hI bYTw klwl Tykydwr Srwb nUM vycdw rihMdw hY, pr mihmw ieh BI nhIˆ jwxdw, kÎoˆik ieh Dn dw ihqkwrI loBI pÎwrw huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur sbd ky iliK piV gwvq hY; ibrlo AMimRq rsu pdu AiDkwrI hY [530[

Unknown.translation: Similarly many write Gur Shabad and Gurbani, sing and read it but. a rare person among them harbours loving desire of relishing and acquiring the divine elixir from it.  (530)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr hI gur sbd gurbwxI nUM ilKdy pVHdy Aqy gOˆidAwˆ hoieAwˆ BI koeI ivrly hI ies dy AMimRq meI sÍwd AnuBv vwlI pdvI dy AiDkwrI huMdy hn ]530]
